  • Constructor Details

    • BoardController

      public BoardController(BoardRepository boardRepository, ColumnRepository columnRepository, ColumnController columnController)
      Parameters:
      boardRepository - the repository which contains all the data in the database of the boards
      columnRepository - the repository which contains all the data in the database of the columns
      columnController - the controller which handles all the logic for the columns in the db

  • Method Details

    • getAllBoards

      @GetMapping("/getAllBoards") @ResponseBody public List<Board> getAllBoards()
      Returns:
      all boards which are currently in the database

    • getBoardByBoardId

      @GetMapping("/getBoardByBoardId/{boardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Board> getBoardByBoardId(@PathVariable("boardId") Long boardId)
      Parameters:
      boardId - the id of the board that the user is searching for
      Returns:
      the board which corresponds to the id which was provided.

    • addBoard

      @PostMapping("/addBoard/{title}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Board> addBoard(@PathVariable("title") String title)
      Parameters:
      title - of the new board
      Returns:
      responseEntity which contains information whether and what was added to the db

    • editBoardTitle

      @PutMapping("/editBoardTitle/{title}/{boardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Board> editBoardTitle(@PathVariable("title") String title, @PathVariable("boardId") long boardId)
      Parameters:
      title - the new title of the board
      boardId - the board id of the board which needs editing
      Returns:
      whether the board was updated correctly

    • deleteBoard

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteBoard/{boardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Board> deleteBoard(@PathVariable("boardId") long boardId)
      Parameters:
      boardId - the board id of the board which needs to be deleted
      Returns:
      whether the deletion was successful

    • getColumnsByBoardId

      @GetMapping("/getColumnsByBoardId/{boardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Column>> getColumnsByBoardId(@PathVariable("boardId") long boardId)
      Gives all the columns given a certain boardId
      Parameters:
      boardId - the boardId you want the columns from
      Returns:
      a List with all the corresponding columns
